page.title: 18Charleswold Court
page.content: This nursing home for the elderly opens in late autumn 1985. Set in an acre of ground, it consists of renovated and adapted farm buildings adjacent to a farmhouse (privately occupied). The farmer started this venture when he could not get planning permission for residential or industrial development of the redundant buildings. There are 21 single bedrooms and 4 double rooms on ground level; ultimately 30 residents will be accommodated. Staff rooms and a guest room are on the first floor. Provision for a small number of couples is envisaged. Several rooms will look out on to a courtyard garden. The public rooms overlook the gently rolling countryside.
